content.text: I want to learn how to manage my finances in a way that will help me reach my goal of becoming a millionaire.
I know how that feels. I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets.
Thats awesome! I am not a morning person, but I love playing with my baby's mobile.
I love the mild weather in Portland. I used to be a dog trainer before my current job.
How did you like being a dog trainer? I'm spending my weekend at home, catching up on my favorite shows and reading a book.
It was fun, but I did not like the long hours. I have a wife and two kids. I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips.
That sounds like a lot of work! I am glad you are enjoying Portland. I like fitness and trying new things.
I like trying new things too. I want to learn how to play the ukulele. What are some of your favorite fitness activities?
I love hiking and swimming. I am thinking about taking a fitness class at my gym.
That sounds like fun! I like to take yoga classes. I am also trying to get back into running.
Yoga is a great way to relax. I have not run in a long time. Maybe I will join you in a running class!
